title: Investigate Cazador's Palace
content:
ituation.

While exploring Fraygo's Flophouse you can overhear 2 vampires discussing a party in Cazador's Palace. The leader of the Tribe of Gur asks you to save their children in Cazador's Palace. The entrance to the Szarr Palace South Tower locates near the Lower City waypoint. (X:-68; Y:-53.) In order to open the Sinister Door in Cazador's Palace, you need to find Kozakuran Dictionary in a necrotic room and Szarr Family Ring on Godey. Both are on the 1st floor of the palace.(Kozakuran Diction
